faqs.question: How can I get food delivered to my doorstep?
faqs.answer: Simply enter your address to find restaurants and stores near you, browse through a variety of cuisines, check menus and prices, add your favorite items to the cart, and proceed to checkout. Once the payment is completed, your delicious food will be on its way!

faqs.question: Which takeout restaurants are open near me?
faqs.answer: You can check available takeout restaurants by entering your location in the search bar. You'll see all restaurants and stores delivering to your area.

faqs.question: Do food delivery services operate 24/7?
faqs.answer: Yes, some food delivery services operate 24/7. However, availability depends on the restaurant's operating hours. You can check which restaurants offer late-night delivery by entering your address.

faqs.question: Can I pay with cash on delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, cash on delivery is available at many restaurants and stores. Simply select the 'Cash on Delivery' option at checkout.

faqs.question: What online payment options are available?
faqs.answer: You can pay online using a credit card, debit card, or other available digital payment methods during checkout.

faqs.question: Can I order food for someone else?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can place an order for someone else by entering their name and delivery address during checkout. Make sure the details are accurate to avoid delivery issues.

faqs.question: How much does delivery cost?
faqs.answer: Delivery fees vary based on your location and the restaurant you order from. You can always check the delivery fee before placing your order. Some restaurants also offer free delivery!

faqs.question: Which restaurants allow online ordering?
faqs.answer: Many restaurants support online ordering, including popular fast-food chains and local eateries. Enter your address to explore available restaurants near you.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum order amount?
faqs.answer: Yes, some restaurants have a minimum order value. This varies depending on the restaurant and is displayed during the ordering process.

faqs.question: What is the difference between delivery and pick-up?
faqs.answer: With delivery, a rider collects your order and brings it to your address. With pick-up, you collect your order directly from the restaurant, saving time and sometimes even delivery fees.
